Device.name: ECO Fluorometer/Nephalometer
Device.description: Wetlabs ECO FLNTUS Combination Fluorometer and Nephalometer with Wiper

RecordVariable.name: String_MVS_1
RecordVariable.description: string that starts every record

RecordVariable.name: String_Num_1
RecordVariable.description: String that starts every record

RecordVariable.name: Date_1
RecordVariable.description: date in dd/mm/yy format of 1st sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: Time_1
RecordVariable.description: time of day in hh:mm:ss format of 1st sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: Fluor_RefSignal_1
RecordVariable.description: fluroescence reference light signal of 1st sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: Fluorescence_1
RecordVariable.description: fluorescence signal of 1st sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: NTU_RefSignal_1
RecordVariable.description: Nephalometry turbidity units reference signal of 1st sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: NTU_1
RecordVariable.description: Nephalometry turbidity units signal of 1st sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: ThermistorTemp_1
RecordVariable.description: Internal Thermistor Temperature of 1st sample in this record

RecordVariable.description: date in dd/mm/yy format of 2nd sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: Time_2
RecordVariable.description: time of day in hh:mm:ss format of 2nd sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: Fluorescence_2
RecordVariable.description: fluorescence signal of 2nd sample in this record

RecordVariable.name: ThermistorTemp_2
RecordVariable.description: Internal Thermistor Temperature of 2nd sample in this record
